links.title: AAPL pops to highest close since January 23rd
links.description: Feb 23, 2018 [< 1 min read] Highlights: TQ Sentiment: 73% [bullish] Overview Moving higher for the 2nd day in a row, AAPL finished the week 1.78% higher at 175.50 after gaining $3.00 (1.74%) today on low volume. Today's closing price of 175.50 marks the highest close since January 23rd.
